blockchain.title: Can Blockchain Applications be relied upon in the long run?
blockchain.content: Of course, Blockchain is relatively new compared to the technologies we use today. In such a small time, it has managed to attract industrial and global leaders who are proactively experimenting to use it in their business to increase their influence. Blockchain Apps is far more stable and has an active community following. It is only a matter of time before Blockchain revolutionizes all the industries.

blockchain.title: Why should I choose Blockchain App Development when my business is already flourishing?
blockchain.content: A business is successful and can sustain for a long time only when it can undergo renovation every time the industry changes. And if the change can further increase your business, we would recommend you to embrace it.

blockchain.title: What’s Your Pricing Model for Blockchain Development Services?
blockchain.content: We usually work in Fixed Price Model, Time & Materials Model, and milestone-based projects. You can also hire our Blockchain Developers to work on your project. Sometimes, we receive specific client requests on the development model, and if it aligns with our interest, we are flexible to work on it.

blockchain.title: When should I choose Relia Software for my Blockchain Software Development?
blockchain.content: Relia Software remains the first choice for Blockchain App Development because we deliver comprehensive solutions that cater to all the needs of a business. And we have incorporated the best Blockchain developers for quality yet speedy development and timely delivery.

flutter.title: Do your on-demand app offer technical support?
flutter.content: Yes, Relia offers on-demand technical support to the clients and ensures competent deliverables. The support team provides the initial setup, constant communication throughout the launch, and post-launch of your on-demand application.

flutter.title: Do you give a demo for potential customers?
flutter.content: Yes, you can submit your queries regarding any development services in the web form on our website and our team will get back to you at the earliest with a demo based on your business requirements.

flutter.title: How do you assign developers for the development?
flutter.content: Only after careful requirement gathering and project considerations, we assign a skilled and professional engineer to work dedicatedly on your project. We allocate developers with diverse skill-set and desired profiles for individual clients. Or you can hire a flutter developer of your choice after conducting introductory sessions with our team.

flutter.title: What product management methodology do you use?
flutter.content: We take a flexible approach to our project management. Adopting the Agile and Scrum methodology, we hold a daily standup and meetings that streamline the work throughout the day and helps keep the members in sync with the shared goal in view.  With full transparency and control over the team, the project crosses each milestone with ease and maximum productivity.

angular.title: While hiring Angular developers’ team for my dream Project, what extra perks would I be availing?
angular.content: This is a matter of consultation, but we can assure you that you will get something more than expected. Here you will get an experienced team of Angular developers along with a project manager who can reduce your overall burden to manage the project.

angular.title: How can we feel confident about Angular developers' expertise?
angular.content: You would get the best results when you check out your developers' skills along with thorough expertise which is the key requisite for taking any interview via Skype call. At Relia, we are always ready to prove our expertise in the way you deem perfect. You need not think twice if you want to provide us with test tasks to test and prove our coding skills and standards.

angular.title: Do you charge any hidden costs while providing Angular development services?
angular.content: Apart from the charges for third party Ad-ons, there is nothing much we would be charging you with. Everything would be transparent and in case of any additional cost, we would inform you in advance.

angular.title: Do you Sign NDA for my project?
angular.content: Yes, we do provide and sign NDAs. For our team, Our customer integrity and trust are of highest priority.

angular.title: Will the hired AngularJS developer work dedicatedly for me?
angular.content: Yes, they are going to be a part of your in-house team. You can rely on them with confidence. They would take care of all your requirements by providing immediate turnarounds.

odcbot.title: Why BOT model offshoring is the best option for your business?
odcbot.content: BOT model would always ensure that you cut down the unnecessary costs, manage your intellectual properties security-wise and control all the assets wisely. You get to complete the project on-time without any hurdles.

odcbot.title: Who would be involved in designing and building the project under BOT model?
odcbot.content: Relia Software would take responsibility for that. We ensure that we achieve timely delivery on the process with zeal towards perfection while designing and building every project under BOT model.

odcbot.title: How much does it cost for ODC services?
odcbot.content: It wouldn’t cost much when you depend on ODC services compared to the inhouse team. At Relia Software, we always charge reasonable prices.

odcbot.title: Why Relia Software for ODC?
odcbot.content: At Relia Software, you get all the required support with regards to ODC. With that, you can develop high-quality products and deliver the best services in the market.

mvp.title: What does MVP mean in Agile?
mvp.content: MVP is nothing but a concept from Lean Startup that stresses on the importance of learning in every phase throughout the new product development. It aims at understanding the mindset of every customer with fewer efforts.

mvp.title: What is the purpose of a POC?
mvp.content: This small exercise would involve testing the design assumption or idea. The major purpose behind the development of POC is to understand the functionality as well as verify a particular theory or concept which we can achieve in development.

mvp.title: Is MVP a prototype?
mvp.content: MVP is almost similar to prototype but prototype plays the role of the foundation for MVP. Prototype describes how the product would be held in the market.

mvp.title: Why do you need MVP and POC?
mvp.content: The main purpose behind MVP and POC is to develop a reliable product. These methods are used to test the ideas before materializing it.

uiux.title: What is the difference between UI design and UX design?
uiux.content: UX Design stands for User Experience Design, while UI design refers to User Interface Design. UI design is about the things that users see while navigating a digital product on an application or software. While UX design is the feeling that they have when doing so.

uiux.title: Why is UI UX design important?
uiux.content: UI UX is an important element of building an application these days. The major focus of any application is how quickly and efficiently the app moves around with the design. A good UI UX design will ensure that the end-users are able to navigate a digital product in the most efficient fashion. This also leads to attracting more traffic to the website or the app.

uiux.title: What are all the UI UX Design Services that you are offering?
uiux.content: In our wide range of services, our UI UX Design solutions involve the aspects of information architecture, interaction design, navigation design, wireframing, and usability engineering.

uiux.title: What are the benefits of UI UX designs?
uiux.content:
Though there are many, here are a few listed:

  • Higher customer acquisition from your new website visitors and application users
  • Increase in customer retention as your beautiful and intuitive product is remembered by the users
  • A low cost on support and maintenance.
  • Higher productivity with good user experience
  • The development time reduces significantly and it further avoids development mistakes
  • A hike in revenues which in turn has a positive impact on the conversion rates

enterprise.title: Which apps can be categorized as Enterprise apps?
enterprise.content: When a set of applications are used to improve and organize the businesses and Enterprises’ internal processes, mitigate the challenges, and provide enhanced work experience to their customers, they are categorized as Enterprise applications.

enterprise.title: What are the latest trends in enterprise application development?
enterprise.content: The enterprise apps are designed to fuel the businesses with the power of the latest technologies like Blockchain and AI.  in the enterprise app domain, omnichannel strategies are picking up the latest trends. However, businesses are now aiming to take employee experience to the next level with apps across all platforms they interact with.

enterprise.title: What are the advantages of cross-platform mobile development in enterprise mobility?
enterprise.content: when you invest in mobile app development for business, the primary benefit is the low development cost and earlier reach to the market. It simply gives you a chance to get your application to multiple devices and platforms and your employees get access to the application in real-time.

enterprise.title: What makes Relia among the trusted Enterprise Mobile App Development Companies?
enterprise.content: With years of deployment and development experience, Relia has adapted to provide enterprise mobile solutions across numerous industries. Our knowledge base and expertise help us deliver world-class and challenging Enterprise mobility projects and thus, lets us offer differentiated and strong enterprise mobility services and solutions to all.

chatbot.title: How much it costs to build chatbots?
chatbot.content: Chatbot Development cost depends on various factors such as the customizations requested, industries it is going to be of use, and people it is going to connect with, We would recommend you get in touch with your Chatbot Development Services Company for a detailed estimate.

chatbot.title: How long it takes to build custom chatbots?
chatbot.content: The timeline completely depends on the customizations requested for the software and the chatbot development company undertaking the project. It is best to consult Chatbot solution experts to know the timeline based on your business needs.

nodejs.title: What is the cost to hire a NodeJS Developer?
nodejs.content: You can hire NodeJS developers at a nominal rate as our cost-effective policy help you choose from the top NodeJs developers in our team who build remarkable application/websites right in the deadline.

nodejs.title: How much time does it take to develop a NodeJS Project?
nodejs.content: The timeline depends on the requirements, size and model of the project. In general, it takes about 3 to 8 weeks to complete a project while factors like size, customization, integration, feature, and functionalities of your website can impact it.

nodejs.title: What project management tools do you use?
nodejs.content: Relia boosts of top-notch management tools aligned with agile practices like Jira, Slack, Trello. While we welcome adopting any other tool that can serve the team and our client alike.

python.title: Can we do python with limited knowledge?
python.content: Irrespective of your Python knowledge, our professional python experts are trained to work at all levels and industries.

python.title: Is Python the right application for Startups?
python.content: Python is a great choice for small scale businesses as an affordable option. It scales your business effectively in no time. Our python software development services will be a great match for the initial requirements of your startup.

python.title: Can the Python developers work in my timezone?
python.content: As a leading Python development company, we offer our services globally and in all timezones.

nextjs.title: If I hire dedicated Next.js developers, will they work only for my project?
nextjs.content: Yes, if you choose to hire Next.js developers with a dedicated team model, they will be dedicating their working time only for your project. Even their leaves will be processed only after your approval.

nextjs.title: Will you be providing support after the completion of Next.js web app development?
nextjs.content: Yes, every project we complete is provided with free support up to a certain period. If you are in need of support or any other service after the fixed period, we have a good number of affordable plans for that as well.

nextjs.title: I want to hire a team of Next.js developers, but I plan to scale the team in the future. Can you work on this model?
nextjs.content: Sure, Relia Software can assist you to scale up and scale down your Next.js development teams, but we will expect you to provide the information before two weeks.

nextjs.title: How do you ensure Next.js web development quality?
nextjs.content: We take a methodical approach right from the initiation of Next.js development process and follow code standards to ensure a bug-free product. We also have dedicated testing and quality assurance teams to analyze the project before deployment. Apart from that, we also have periodic code reviews and walk-throughs to render the wrongs right at the nascent.

netweb.title: What are some of the good web applications where .NET is used?
netweb.content: Although there are thousands of applications built with .NET, the best example is Stack Overflow which serves more than 5 million page views with a meager number of nine servers.

netweb.title: What can I build with .NET?
netweb.content: ASP.NET Web applications, web services, windows applications, windows services, console applications, mobile applications, and class libraries are some of the common solutions built with .NET.

netweb.title: Is it possible to build a custom web app with .NET?
netweb.content: Yes, you can build custom web apps with .NET. However, it might take some time to develop your app as .NET development companies will have to build your web from scratch.

netweb.title: Is it advisable to hire Full-stack ASP.NET Developers?
netweb.content: Of course, yes. Full-stack implies that along with ASP.NET, developers can see to end-to-end project development with other technologies. But we would recommend you to analyze the tech stack of the developers before you hire.

reactnavtive.title: How can we save Money by Building the App With React Native?
reactnavtive.content: By hiring dedicated React Native app developer for your project you invest meticulously. The single codebase of the react native development brings the development hours and resource requirement to a minimum. And thus, lowering the development cost.

reactnavtive.title: Is React Native the Future of Mobile App Development?
reactnavtive.content: Observing the trends in the technology space and the shifting demands of the businesses, cross-platform app development process is indeed a soundproof investment. React Native is going to be very high in demand in the time to come.

reactnavtive.title: Is it possible to build a custom web app with .NET?
reactnavtive.content: Yes, you can build custom web apps with .NET. However, it might take some time to develop your app as .NET development companies will have to build your web from scratch.

reactnavtive.title: How Much will the Develop a React Native Mobile App Cost me?
reactnavtive.content: The React Native app development is the most feasible for any kind of business. The cost is dependent on the following: app categories, complexity, features, UI design, etc. A ballpark figure can be estimated after considering these factors.
